artist: Artist: Félix Vallotton; Publisher: Edmond Sagot
inscription:
Signature; Stamp; Inscription

see Signed

[Judith Pillsbury] stamp UR; [actuellement, 39 bis, Rue de Chateaudon, 39 bis]
text: This woodcut was commissioned as an advertisement for Edmond Sagot's print gallery in Paris.  Throngs of eager collectors crowd around the gallery's window in a scene that Sagot wished was commonplace, but probably happened infrequently if at all.
title: The Print Lovers
